3Color #permalink

defines all colors to be used in the document

3.1@mixin ac #permalink

  • $color
    color to be used
  • $percent
    percent

shorthand for @mixin appropriate-colors

3.2@mixin appropriate-colors #permalink

  • $color
    the color to be used
  • $percent
    the percent to mix with the contrast (either white or black). defaults to 30%

creates sets color and background color based on relationship set in parameters

3.3@function color-monotone #permalink

  • $color
    color to start from
  • $num
    the color to return -> chosen based on choosing a number between 0 and $denom. If the middle number is chosen, the same color as $color is returned
  • $denom
    establishes the range of colors to be chosen from (think $num / $denom, or x / 10). defaults to 10

chooses a color based on parameters set
